ai-iti77:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti77:2.1_0: “This body is fragile, mendicants, consciousness is liable to fade away, and all attachments are impermanent, suffering, and perishable.”
ai-iti77:2.2_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti77:4.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
